title: Sell High West Limited Releases
metaTitle: Sell High West Midwinter Night's Dram | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your High West Midwinter Night's Dram, Yippee Ki-Yay, and Bourye. We buy rare High West whiskey. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Midwinter Night's Dram and discontinued High West bottles.
introParagraph: High West Distillery in Utah produces some of the most beloved limited release ryes and bourbons. We actively purchase A Midwinter Night's Dram (all Acts), as well as discontinued favorites like Yippee Ki-Yay and older batches of Bourye. Sell your collection directly for a fair price.
whatWeBuy: High West Rocky Mountain Rye (16 or 21 Year)
High West Midwinter Night's Dram The Encore
whatWeDoNotBuy: Standard High West American Prairie Bourbon
Standard High West Rendezvous Rye (recent batches)
photoChecklist: Front label showing the Act and Scene (for MWND)
conditionFactors: Act number is the primary value driver for Midwinter Night's Dram
Label condition (High West labels can peel)
pricingFactors: Act number (Act 1, 2, and 3 are significantly more valuable)
Discontinued status (Yippee Ki-Yay is no longer produced)

faqs.question: Which Act of Midwinter Night's Dram is most valuable?
faqs.answer: Act 1 and Act 2 are the most valuable due to their age and scarcity. Act 3 is also highly sought after.

faqs.question: Do you buy Yippee Ki-Yay?
faqs.answer: Yes, since it was discontinued, Yippee Ki-Yay has become a collectible bottle we actively purchase.

faqs.question: Do you buy Campfire?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy standard Campfire unless it is an older batch or part of a larger collection.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Rocky Mountain Rye?
faqs.answer: Yes, the 16 Year and 21 Year Rocky Mountain Rye releases are extremely rare and valuable. We are very interested in these.

faqs.question: Does the Scene number matter?
faqs.answer: Generally, the Act number determines the value. The Scene number (indicating the bottling day) rarely affects the price unless it's a specific collector's preference.

faqs.question: How do I ship multiples?
faqs.answer: We can provide multiple shipping labels for larger collections. Just let us know how many bottles you have.
